snippet.title: Golden Sun: Dawn of Djinn Release Trailer
snippet.description:
A version 2 update has been released. Learn more about it here:
https://youtu.be/cOLSHrnh2-Q?si=TlMPoj3T-UCMQlqn

Download the latest version here:
https://jackitk.itch.io/golden-sun-dawn-of-djinn

Like what you see?  Projects I do along with social media accounts you can follow me on for updates.
https://jackitku2b.wixsite.com/jackitK

0:00 Introduction
0:12 Experienced a remixed version of a GBA classic. With changes to combat and Overworld navigation...
0:18 Face-off against new foes and new twists on classic ones...
1:36 Including harder bosses with new twists to their attacks.
2:28 Enjoy new additions and adjustments to make roaming the world and solving puzzles more enjoyable...
2:48 Including Retreat adapted for fast travel and a togglable Avoid...
4:12 Adjust your level of challenge through equipping the Casual or Brutal Key.
4:30 Wield new Psynergy through equipment and classes.
5:34 Reworked movepool for tri-elemental classes and some new Psynergy for other classes...
6:00 A brand new quad-elemental class to reduce P synergy item needs even further...
6:11 A reworked weapon system making each weapon type distinct and have it's own traits...
6:26 Along with two new types of weapons, Gloves and Mitts.
6:40 Featuring a handful of recovery and battle items to make use of in combat.
7:15 Collect new Djinn to wield in your adventure...
8:06 and find the new Djinni Charms to enchance your arsenal of Psynergy
8:32 A new update to tier 4 summons, trading a bit of their power for new secondary effects.
9:08 Seek out the Grand Djinn, strongest Djinn in the land...
